title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, the system reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: The JAR packager reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' when pressing finish.
EB: I expected to be able to create a JAR file with unsaved editors. If this is not allowed, there should be a dialog prompting me to save before proceeding.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the JAR packager wizard.
2. Enter all the necessary fields.
3. Press finish.
